long_description: On your next ski or snowshoe outing, enjoy cozy warmth in the women's SmartWool Lightweight Hoodie. Breathable, soft merino wool keeps you comfortable during cold weather. Merino wool wicks away moisture and breathes to regulate temperature for outstanding comfort in a variety of conditions. Hoodie pulls up for head warmth; wool fabric offers UPF 35 sun protection against harmful ultraviolet rays. SmartWool Lightweight Hoodie features an asymmetrical zip on the left raglan seam that provides custom ventilation. Sculpted side panels move the side seams to the front of the body for reduced chafing and irritation; droptail bottom hem adds extra coverage. Unlike traditional wool, SmartWool items do not itch and can be repeatedly washed and dried without shrinking. Closeout.
short_description: On your next ski or snowshoe outing, enjoy cozy warmth in the women's SmartWool Lightweight Hoodie. Breathable, soft merino wool keeps you comfortable during cold weather.
